articles.title: Ethiopian refugee in car accident is left for dead en route to SA - News24
articles.description: A Zimbabwean court has heard how an Ethiopian national in transit to South Africa was left for dead by his colleagues after a car accident.
articles.content:
• An Ethiopian illegal immigrant was fined and awaits deportation from Zimbabwe.
  • He was left for dead by the roadside as others made the trip to South Africa.
